name: Dead Stars
description:
Outlive the impending end of the universe by depleting its last remnants.

Dead Stars was made for Ludum Dare 50 and its theme "Delay the Inevitable." It's inspired by several ideas and concepts about how the universe will end. Your goal is to survive to that end by collecting as much energy as possible.

How to Play

  • WASD/Arrow keys = Select
  • Enter/Space = Confirm
  • Esc/P = Pause

Here's a guide on how to play the game, with an in-depth explanation of its mechanics.

Changelog

  • Fixed a bug where the page scrolls when pressing the up or down arrow keys

Thanks to jazz_horse for helping me test the game.
